suncertify.common
Class Record

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.common.Record
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class Record
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Wrapper around an instance of a record in the database file. Contains the data from the file, its position in the file and a deleted flag. Provides some conveniency methods to retrieve, convert and manipulate its fields.

See Also:
Serialized Form
